section.title: Enhancing Your CentOS 5 Samba Server Appliance
section.para: In this part, you will learn how to update your appliance with some common server administration components using two different methods. These updates require changes to the config-rpm and packages TLEs already in place in your samber-server.xml file.

Following the illustrations in this section, you can conditionally configure your appliance's applications, automate its installation, create various install images, add business support required by the legal and software development departments and secure your appliance. All of these options utilize top-level elements that you include in your appliance definition file, samber-server.xml.
